summary: I am a hard working and enthusiastic Product Manager who is interested in all things Web and Mobile. My professional experience has given me the opportunity to lead multiple projects in both Mobile and Web applications, particularly in the Financial Services and Payments sectors of the world. I have worked in the Financial industry for a majority of my career, and have been a part of various technology modernization and redesigns. I have a strong interest in Design and research, and have always had a strong spirit to create the best Digital experience for any customer.

profile_positions.description:
Currently responsible for product roadmap and feature development in the customer facing mobile application with expertise on payments and identity.
• Responsible for setting team objectives and KPI’s across multiple projects in development and discovery.
• Reduced our payments operations cost by 0.2% of gross bookings with a savings of est. 30-50k annually by optimizing our payments authorizations for our customers.
• Manage the backlog of developers and operations analysts to ensure that our UI/UX initiatives are providing the best customer experience and helping generate revenue for our business.
• Work with multiple city managers in different regions to address customer issues within the mobile app and adhere to city rules and regulations.
• Increased onboarding completion by 10% by conducting data analysis and leading user testing on the existing UI/UX of our customer journey.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for both web and mobile applications product strategy roadmap in the Retail banking value stream for our B2B product.
• Acting as liaison between Customers, CS and IT teams to refine the product and incorporate features based on market demands.
• Direct manager and coach to Business analysts for the mobile and web apps. • Worked with stakeholders to develop and maintain collaboration on the
product roadmap based on organization goals and industry/product best
practices within the Retail banking market.
• Worked in collaboration with UX designers and UX researchers to lead
discovery and user testing for new projects such as a new Family app to generate sales of the product.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Owner/Manager

profile_positions.description:
Work Closely with UI/UX Designers & research team to create a seamless customer experience for the redesign of the online website.
• Defined and created the product roadmap for the next 3 years with various business lines and stakeholders such as advisors and private investors.
• Lead Agile methodologies such as back log refinement and sprint planning
for our scrum team.
• Lead research topics and user testing for various feature sets as well as
tracked and interpreted analytics data to lead our goals.
• Used data analytics on existing customer experience to help define priorities,
areas of improvement and lead user research studies to conduct A/B testing.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Manager- Scotia Wealth Management

profile_positions.description:
Lead the refining, planning and execution of all Payments initiatives for Scotiabank’s modernization of their native Mobile application.
• Launched various Payments features for the Mobile app for payments domestically & internationally such as: Interac e-Transfer & Western Union.
• Worked with various vendors and stakeholders for high profile projects that were number one in the industry such as Apple Pay, Samsung Pay and Android Pay.
• Created a product roadmap for our mobile team on future initiatives with input from Payments Canada and through competitor analysis.
• Lead Scotiabank’s first Digital only International Money movement project; launched January 2020.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner- Digital Payments

profile_positions.description:
Worked with multiple Payment Network Operators such as Visa, Amex, Mastercard and Interac for projects related to various partnerships in payments for Scotiabank.
• Provided in depth systems analysis and workflows for various projects in order for developers and technical leads to interpret requirements.
• Worked on Mobile application redesign in relation to payment initiatives such as integration with Masterpass hosted by Mastercard.
• Provided detailed requirements to multiple scrum teams and supported various business lines in Agile methodologies.
• Pulled analytics and created reporting for various projects to provide to Vendors and stakeholders.
• Facilitated two Sales Projects for Mortgage and GIC renewal generating a 25% increase in sales.
profile_positions.title: Business Systems Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Define test cases required for a project based on use cases where these are available and / or business requirements and / or Internet design specifications with coaching from a Quality Assurance (QA) lead as required.  
- Design and conduct walkthroughs of test cases and test scripts with guidance from a QA lead as required.
- Design and execute test scripts as part of a test team.
- Identify, log and retest variances encountered during the testing process.
- Keep deliverables within the scope of defined work packages.
- Provide regular testing status updates to QA lead and / or project manager.
- Coordinate the activities of other testers on smaller projects on request.
profile_positions.title: Test Analyst, Quality Assurance, Internet Channel

profile_positions.description:
•	Maintain and update filing, inventory, mailing, and database systems, both manually or using a computer.
•	Operate office equipment such as photocopiers and scanners, voice mail systems, and personal computers.
•	Process and prepare Excel documents recording expense reimbursements, financial data or business forms. 
•	Assist in event planning of organizational events that occur within the University in a professional manner.
•	Compile, copy, sort, and file records of office activities, business transactions, and other activities.
profile_positions.title: Student Office assistant

profile_positions.description:
• Maintain and update filing, inventory, mailing, and database systems, both manually or 
using a computer. 
• Use various software programs and database systems such as Trade Innovations, Rightfax
and SharePoint in order to process various Trade Documents. 
• Process Export, Import and Letter of Credit documents while abiding by Anti-Money 
Laundering policies. 
• Dispatch of daily Documents in an efficient and effective manner while following tight 
deadlines. 
• Operated as a part of the Pre-Processing Team to initiate work for clients while 
maintaining a high level of confidentiality. 
• Attended team meetings and participated in reporting on improvements of business 
practices.
profile_positions.title: Trade Support Officer

profile_positions.description:
•	Determined charges for services requested, collect deposits or payments, or arrange for billing. 
•	Complete contract forms, prepare change of address records, and issue service discontinuance orders, using computers. 
•	Resolved customers’ service or billing complaints by performing activities such as exchanging merchandise, refunding money, and adjusting bills.
•	Worked independently for most shifts and managed the service desk. 
•	Kept records of customer interactions and transactions, recording details of inquiries, complaints, and comments, as well as actions taken.  
•	Operated the register, calculated daily sales and made bank deposits of up to $10,000.
profile_positions.title: Customer service representative

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed customer service skills through greeting customers and established what each customer wants or needs. 
•	Maintained knowledge of current sales and promotions, policies regarding payment and exchanges, and security practices.
•	Watched for and recognized security risks and thefts, and know how to prevent or handle these situations.
•	Cleaned shelves, counters, and tables every shift.
profile_positions.title: Retail Associate

volunteer_experiences.description: Worked with Elephants at a Refugee Center and various wildlife such as gibbons, langurs, bears, reptiles, etc.
